input_text:
Job Title: Inside Sales Representative

Location: Aurora, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
We are seeking sales professionals to join the inside sales team with an industry leading industrial organization. The position offers commissions + bonuses and growth opportunities. If interested, please apply with an updated resume for consideration.

 Description 

Make outbound calls to leads that have been acquired through networking and other sales avenues priorWill be calling on contractors (electrical, home building, etc.) to see their interest in using their productsIf the contractor seems open to working with them, they will pass the call off to a Territory Sales Manager in most casesThey will also follow up on missed calls from those who are returning their messagesActively support the company’s culture and business missionPrioritize call activity to customers to uncover new opportunitiesResearch, define and initiate outreach to new customer prospects / sales opportunities through outbound calls and emailsDeliver scripted talks that describe the company’s products or servicesObtaining customer information such as name and address for shipping productsTrack customer’s contact information and log all call activity in Salesforce.com.Facilitate growth and development of existing customers by building solid relationships, promoting and providing education of productsUnderstand customer needs and requirements


Meet or exceed performance metrics for outbound calls

Engage in appropriate training opportunities relative to business and product knowledge and enhancements to maintain continuous education for self-development


 Experience Level 

Junior Level

 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Inside Sales Representative
output_json.summary: Sales professional required for an industry leading industrial organization.
job_responsibilities: Call on contractors to gauge interest in products
Pass calls to Territory Sales Managers when appropriate
Support company culture and business mission
Prioritize call activity to uncover new opportunities
Research and initiate outreach to new customer prospects
Deliver scripted talks about products or services
Promote and provide education on products
Meet or exceed performance metrics for outbound calls
Engage in training opportunities for business and product knowledge
output_json.company_information: TEKsystems is a partner in transformation, offering Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application solutions. They work with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe, and Asia.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: The company is an equal opportunity employer considering all applications without regard to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, or any characteristic protected by law.
